mapper.select: SELECT A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_PWD , A.NAME , A.PHONE , A.EMAIL , A.ADDRESS , A.AGREEMENT , A.ACC_INACTIVE_YN , A.TEMP_PWD_YN , A.ACCUM_LOGIN_COUNT , A.LOGIN_FAILED_COUNT , A.LATEST_LOGIN_DATE , A.ACC_CREATION_DATE , A.ACC_CHANGED_DATE , A.ACC_CLOSING_DATE , A.ACC_CLOSING_YN , B.MEMBER_ID REF_MEMBER_ID , B.AUTHORITY_CODE REF_AUTH_CODE , C.AUTHORITY_CODE REF_AUTH_CODE2 , C.AUTHORITY_NAME , C.AUTHORITY_DESC FROM TBL_MEMBER A LEFT JOIN TBL_ROLE B ON(A.MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID) LEFT JOIN TBL_AUTHORITY C ON(B.AUTHORITY_CODE = C.AUTHORITY_CODE) WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = #{ username }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_MEMBER ( MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_PWD , NAME , PHONE , EMAIL , ADDRESS , AGREEMENT , ACC_INACTIVE_YN , TEMP_PWD_YN , ACCUM_LOGIN_COUNT , LOGIN_FAILED_COUNT , LATEST_LOGIN_DATE , ACC_CREATION_DATE , ACC_CHANGED_DATE , ACC_CLOSING_DATE , ACC_CLOSING_YN ) VALUES ( #{ memberId } , #{ memberPwd } , #{ name } , #{ phone } , #{ email } , #{ address } , DECODE(#{ agreement }, 'Y', 'Y', 'N') , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , NULL , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , NULL , DEFAULT )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId }
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = #{ email }
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_MEMBER SET ACC_INACTIVE_YN = 'N' WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId }
UPDATE TBL_MEMBER SET ACCUM_LOGIN_COUNT = ACCUM_LOGIN_COUNT+1 , LATEST_LOGIN_DATE = SYSDATE , LOGIN_FAILED_COUNT = 0 WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{ username }
UPDATE TBL_MEMBER SET LATEST_LOGIN_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{ username }
UPDATE TBL_MEMBER SET LOGIN_FAILED_COUNT = 0 WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{ username }
UPDATE TBL_MEMBER SET LOGIN_FAILED_COUNT = LOGIN_FAILED_COUNT+1 WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{ username }
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{ username }
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_MEMBER SET ACC_INACTIVE_YN = 'Y' WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{ username }
mapper.select: SELECT A.ORDER_NO , A.ORDER_DATE , A.DLVR_STATUS , B.OPTION_NO , O.OPT_BODY_COLOR , O.OPT_INK_COLOR , O.OPT_POINT_SIZE , O.OPT_EXTRA_CHARGE , P.PROD_NO , P.PROD_NAME , D.BRAND_NAME , T.THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM TBL_ORDER_DETAIL A LEFT JOIN TBL_ORDER B ON(A.ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_PAYMENT C ON(B.ORDER_NO = C.ORDER_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_OPTION O ON(B.OPTION_NO = O.OPTION_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_PRODUCT P ON(O.REF_PROD_NO = P.PROD_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_BRAND D ON(P.BRAND_NO = D.BRAND_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_ATTACHMENT T ON(P.PROD_NO = T.REF_PROD_NO) WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId }

SELECT A.ORDER_NO , A.ORDER_DATE , A.RCVR_NAME , A.RCVR_PHONE , A.RCVR_ADDRESS , A.DLVR_REQ_MESSAGE , A.DLVR_STATUS , B.OPTION_NO , B.ORDER_QUANTITY , B.ORDER_AMOUNT , C.PAYMENT_NO , C.PAYMENT_METHOD , C.PAYMENT_AMOUNT , C.PAYMENT_DATETIME , L.DELIVERY_FEE , L.DELIVERY_COMPANY , L.DISPATCH_DATE , L.DELIVERY_DATE , N.POINT_AMOUNT , O.OPT_BODY_COLOR , O.OPT_INK_COLOR , O.OPT_POINT_SIZE , O.OPT_EXTRA_CHARGE , P.PROD_NO , P.PROD_NAME , D.BRAND_NAME , T.THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM TBL_ORDER_DETAIL A LEFT JOIN TBL_ORDER B ON(A.ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_PAYMENT C ON(B.ORDER_NO = C.ORDER_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_DELIVERY L ON(C.ORDER_NO = L.ORDER_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_POINT N ON(C.PAYMENT_NO = N.PAYMENT_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_OPTION O ON(B.OPTION_NO = O.OPTION_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_PRODUCT P ON(O.REF_PROD_NO = P.PROD_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_BRAND D ON(P.BRAND_NO = D.BRAND_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_ATTACHMENT T ON(P.PROD_NO = T.REF_PROD_NO) WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId } AND A.ORDER_NO = #{ orderNo }
SELECT SUM(ORDER_AMOUNT) FROM TBL_ORDER WHERE ORDER_NO = #{ orderNo }

SELECT A.OPTION_NO , A.ORDER_QUANTITY , A.ORDER_AMOUNT , O.OPT_BODY_COLOR , O.OPT_INK_COLOR , O.OPT_POINT_SIZE , O.OPT_EXTRA_CHARGE , P.PROD_NO , P.PROD_NAME , B.BRAND_NAME , T.THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM TBL_ORDER A LEFT JOIN TBL_OPTION O ON(A.OPTION_NO = O.OPTION_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_PRODUCT P ON(O.REF_PROD_NO = P.PROD_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_BRAND B ON(P.BRAND_NO = B.BRAND_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_ATTACHMENT T ON(P.PROD_NO = T.REF_PROD_NO) WHERE A.ORDER_NO = #{ orderNo }

SELECT A.ORDER_NO , A.OPTION_NO , B.ORDER_DATE , O.OPT_BODY_COLOR , O.OPT_INK_COLOR , O.OPT_POINT_SIZE , O.OPT_EXTRA_CHARGE , P.PROD_NO , P.PROD_NAME , B.BRAND_NAME , T.THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM TBL_ORDER A LEFT JOIN TBL_ORDER_DETAIL B ON(A.ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_OPTION O ON(A.OPTION_NO = O.OPTION_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_PRODUCT P ON(O.REF_PROD_NO = P.PROD_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_BRAND B ON(P.BRAND_NO = B.BRAND_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_ATTACHMENT T ON(P.PROD_NO = T.REF_PROD_NO) WHERE B.MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId } AND (A.ORDER_NO, A.OPTION_NO) NOT IN (SELECT ORDER_NO, OPTION_NO FROM TBL_REVIEW)

SELECT A.ORDER_NO , A.OPTION_NO , B.ORDER_DATE , L.DELIVERY_DATE , O.OPT_BODY_COLOR , O.OPT_INK_COLOR , O.OPT_POINT_SIZE , O.OPT_EXTRA_CHARGE , P.PROD_NO , P.PROD_NAME , B.BRAND_NAME , T.THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM TBL_ORDER A LEFT JOIN TBL_ORDER_DETAIL B ON(A.ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_DELIVERY L ON(B.ORDER_NO = L.ORDER_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_OPTION O ON(A.OPTION_NO = O.OPTION_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_PRODUCT P ON(O.REF_PROD_NO = P.PROD_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_BRAND B ON(P.BRAND_NO = B.BRAND_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_ATTACHMENT T ON(P.PROD_NO = T.REF_PROD_NO) WHERE B.MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId } AND A.ORDER_NO = #{ orderNo } AND A.OPTION_NO = #{ optionNo }

SELECT A.REVIEW_NO , A.OPTION_NO , A.ORDER_NO , A.MEMBER_ID , A.REVW_TITLE , A.REVW_CONTENT , A.REVW_REG_DATE , A.REVW_HITS , A.REVW_RATINGS , B.THUMBNAIL_PATH , C.REF_PROD_NO FROM TBL_REVIEW A LEFT JOIN TBL_ATTACHMENT B ON(A.REVIEW_NO = B.REF_REVW_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_OPTION C ON(A.OPTION_NO = C.OPTION_NO) WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId }

SELECT A.MEMBER_ID , A.OPTION_NO , B.PROD_NO , B.PROD_NAME , B.DISCOUNT_RATE , B.PROD_PRICE , C.BRAND_NAME , T.THUMBNAIL_PATH , O.OPT_BODY_COLOR , O.OPT_INK_COLOR , O.OPT_POINT_SIZE , O.OPT_EXTRA_CHARGE FROM TBL_WISHLIST A LEFT JOIN TBL_OPTION O ON(A.OPTION_NO = O.OPTION_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_PRODUCT B ON(O.REF_PROD_NO = B.PROD_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_BRAND C ON(C.BRAND_NO = B.BRAND_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_ATTACHMENT T ON(B.PROD_NO = T.REF_PROD_NO) WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId }

SELECT A.POINT_NO , A.POINT_AMOUNT , A.POINT_DATETIME , A.POINT_STATUS , B.ORDER_NO FROM TBL_POINT A LEFT JOIN TBL_PAYMENT B ON(A.PAYMENT_NO = B.PAYMENT_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_ORDER_DETAIL C ON(B.ORDER_NO = C.ORDER_NO) WHERE C.MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId }

SELECT (SELECT SUM(POINT_AMOUNT) SAVE FROM TBL_POINT A LEFT JOIN TBL_PAYMENT B ON(A.PAYMENT_NO = B.PAYMENT_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_ORDER_DETAIL C ON(B.ORDER_NO = C.ORDER_NO) WHERE C.MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId } AND POINT_STATUS = '적립') - (SELECT SUM(POINT_AMOUNT) USED FROM TBL_POINT A LEFT JOIN TBL_PAYMENT B ON(A.PAYMENT_NO = B.PAYMENT_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_ORDER_DETAIL C ON(B.ORDER_NO = C.ORDER_NO) WHERE C.MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId } AND POINT_STATUS = '사용') FROM DUAL
